scripts.export:metadata: mkdir -p ./temp && sfdx force:mdapi:listmetadata -f ./temp/customMetadata.json --json -u humana -m CustomMetadata && node prepare.js
scripts.delete:metadata: sfdx force:mdapi:deploy -w 30 -u humana -d ./temp/kvm && sfdx force:mdapi:deploy -w 30 -u humana -d ./temp/actions && sfdx force:mdapi:deploy -w 30 -u humana -d ./temp/items && sfdx force:mdapi:deploy -w 30 -u humana -d ./temp/cards && sfdx force:mdapi:deploy -w 30 -u humana  -d ./temp/services && sfdx force:mdapi:deploy -w 30 -d ./temp/sources -u humana
scripts.remove:metadata: npm run export:metadata && npm run delete:metadata
scripts.upgrade: git config pull.rebase false && git pull && npm i && node index.js
